translations: n.码数；按码计算；火车站内栏舍之使用费

phrs.translation: 码数, 码距, 土方数, 栏舍使用费
单耗, 件耗, 每件衣服所用面料的码数

sentences.sentence: Vijay Singh says the course will not play as long as the yardage indicates.
sentences.translation: 维杰-辛格说这个洞虽然码数长，但不需要打很多杆。

sentences.sentence: The Chiefs nearly doubled the Ravens in total yardage and time of possession.
sentences.translation: 酋长队向前推进的距离和控球时间几乎是乌鸦队的两倍。

sentences.sentence: When you able to send me the shipment sample yardage as request?
sentences.translation: 你什么时候按要求给我寄运输样品码数呢？
